alert.note: Alert for Glacier; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 8:22PM MDT until July 29 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Glacier County in north central Montana... Northern Toole County in north central Montana... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 820 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 35 miles north of Kevin to 13 miles west of Sunburst, extending northeast into southern Alberta, moving east at 40 mph along the Canadian border. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sunburst and Sweet Grass. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rainfall with these storms may lead to minor flash flooding, especially in low lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
